verses.verse: Do not cast me away from Your presence, And do not take Your ((Luke 11:13)) Holy Spirit from me.
Restore to me the joy of Your salvation, And uphold me by Your ((2 Cor. 3:17)) generous Spirit.
Then I will teach transgressors Your ways, And sinners shall be converted to You.
Deliver me from the guilt of bloodshed, O God, The God of my salvation, And my tongue shall sing aloud of Your righteousness.
O Lord, open my lips, And my mouth shall show forth Your praise.
For ((1 Sam. 15:22); Ps. 50:8-14; (Mic. 6:6-8)) You do not desire sacrifice, or else I would give it; You do not delight in burnt offering.
(Ps. 34:18; (Is. 57:15); 66:2) The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit, A broken and a contrite heartâ€” These, O God, You will not despise.
Do good in Your good pleasure to Zion; Build the walls of Jerusalem.
Then You shall be pleased with (Ps. 4:5) the sacrifices of righteousness, With burnt offering and whole burnt offering; Then they shall offer bulls on Your altar.
